content.column:
Maui - Maltcms User Interface Maui is an application for visualization, exploration and processing of raw data from GC/LC-MS and GCxGC-MS experiments.
Release 1.0 beta
Available Features
chromatogram view (1D and 2D) with interactive ms selection and database query
integration of custom scripts for raw data and csv type data via Groovy
charting of csv and raw data
import and visualization of Maltcms processing results
Confirmed Features for Final Release 1.0 (Jan. 2012)
pipeline editor and runner for Maltcms
interactive peak exploration
manual refinement of peak lists
statistical evaluation of peak tables
peak im-/export with MeltDB
3D viewer with interactive peak exploration for 2D chromatograms based on jzy3D
Unconfirmed Features for Release 1.0
GNU-R integration
3D PCA viewer
1.0 beta Downloads
Windows
Linux
MacOS X
Solaris
Platform independent zip
